thread.title: A List of the Reasons Cited Against Gun Control and an Effort to Think Them Through
thread.title_full: A List of the Reasons Cited Against Gun Control and an Effort to Think Them Through - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: A List of the Reasons Cited Against Gun Control and an Effort to Think Them Through
text: The day I got the first note from Huffington post that I can henceforth blog for them, I was ecstatic - and scared. I wanted to write on topics to provoke thoughts, and provoking thoughts would undoubtedly provoke emotions and opposition
